articles.content: More than 20 minutes after Mads Pedersen (Trek-Segafredo) claimed the victory on stage 6 of the Giro d’Italia, the sight of Mark Cavendish pedalling a solitary path towards the Astana Qazaqstan team … [+2697 chars]

articles.title: Madrid Open’s silencing of players is ‘unacceptable’, says Victoria Azarenka - The Guardian
articles.description: Victoria Azarenka has described the Madrid Open’s decision to silence players by cancelling their speeches after the women’s doubles final as ‘unacceptable’
articles.content:
Victoria Azarenka has described the Madrid Opens decision to silence players by cancelling their speeches after the womens doubles final as unacceptable.
It is part of a backlash to what occurred in… [+9989 chars]
